1.title: Pilot
1.plot: A new Web series that focuses on three friends living together and trying their to best to make it through.

2.title: New House
2.plot: As a way to pay back David for all he has done for him, Russell has a surprise for David that he will never see coming... that surprise being a house. Watch as Russell shows David a tour of their new place, but one thing is missing... TYLER.

3.title: The Fight
3.plot:

4.title: Commercial Struggles
4.plot:

5.title: A Struggling Halloween
5.plot: Struggling, But Getting By returns with a Halloween they will never forget after David, Russell, Nick and an unidentified woman get locked inside of a garage during their annual Halloween party.

6.title: A Struggling Christmas
6.plot: When the boys from Struggling, But Getting By get ready for the holidays and prepare to say their goodbyes to Nick before he heads out to the Air Force, they receive a letter from a 'secret admirer' and try to figure out which one of them the letter is for.

7.title: The Beginning
7.plot: David gets home from touring with his band and insists he's back for good to stay with his best friend, Russell. What happens when Russell's ex girlfriend dumps him? Will David console him or will he let his 'dating game' past get the best of him?

8.title: Law & Idiot
8.plot: To the surprise of everyone, Russell shares the news that he got into law school while David has some news of his own to tell Russell. Meanwhile, Random Guy and Russell spend the day together and have some fun of their own.

imdb.plot outline: After a messy breakup, a dull-witted college student, named Russell, gets kicked out of his ex girlfriend's house and asks his best friend and popular musician, David for a place to stay. While things seem to get off on a good start at first, David begins to experience personal feelings for Russell's now, ex-girlfriend, Hailey. Understandably, problems begin to occur between the two best friends when Russell becomes aware of this news causing David to choose between the girl he's always secretly admired or his best friend.
imdb.title: Struggling
plot: Two best friends who go through various antics and adventures together, learn that no matter how hard the struggle may be, they always find a way to get by.

After a messy breakup, a dull-witted college student, named Russell, gets kicked out of his ex girlfriend's house and asks his best friend and popular musician, David for a place to stay. While things seem to get off on a good start at first, David begins to experience personal feelings for Russell's now, ex-girlfriend, Hailey. Understandably, problems begin to occur between the two best friends when Russell becomes aware of this news causing David to choose between the girl he's always secretly admired or his best friend.
